Smart Display Integration: Integrate a smart display on the TV, allowing users to access apps, browse the internet, and control smart home devices directly from the TV screen.
Voice Control: Implement voice control capabilities into the TV, allowing users to change channels, adjust volume, and access smart features without having to touch the remote.
Virtual Reality Experience: Add a virtual reality headset that connects to the TV, providing an immersive viewing experience for gaming and entertainment.
Multi-Function Screen: Develop a TV with multiple screens that can be used simultaneously for different purposes, such as a video game on one screen and a news feed on another.
Interactive Gaming: Create an interactive gaming system that allows players to control games using physical movements, similar to a motion-controlled game console.
